GetAtt.Description: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the ARN of the cluster,   such as arn:aws:memorydb:us-east-1:123456789012:cluster/my-cluster
The address of the cluster's configuration endpoint.
The port used by the cluster configuration endpoint.
The status of the parameter group used by the cluster, for example active or applying.
The status of the cluster. For example, 'available', 'updating' or 'creating'.
